value.0:
Wax is used by a Signet Ring to set a custom seal on a Wax-Sealed Letter. To set a wax seal you use the #S# chat command. For example type #S#[Crescent Moon] then you can either set the seal on a Letter by using the Signet Ring on the letter or you can set the seal permanently onto the Signet Ring by using the ring on itself. Once you set a seal on the Signet Ring it is permanent but you no longer need to type out the command and can stamp letters as you wish.

You may also choose a colour for the text of your wax seal by buying the colour of wax you wish to use.
